text.value: Safe water refers to water from bore holes, piped water and protected springs
Does the Household have access to a safe water source?
Yes, it has ever been emptied
Has your pit latrine or septic tank ever been emptied?
Who carried out the emptying services?
What is the floor of toilet/ latrine facility made of (floor finish)?
Yes both water and soap are available
No, both water and soap are not available
Does the handwashing facility have running water and soap (or detergent) at the time of visit?
Is there a handwashing facility near the toilet/latrine?
A backyard garden is one with fruits and vegetables within close proximity of the home
Does the Household have a backyard garden?
A soak pit is a hole filled with hard core, covered with a polythene and earth/soil on top
Does the Household have a bath shelter with a soak-pit?
Does the Household have a drying rack for dishes?
Does the Household have a rubbish pit?
Safe drinking water refers to water that is either boiled or treated through chlorination, solar disinfection, segmentation; and Bio sand filters
Does the Household have safe drinking water?
A sanitary kitchen is one which provides a smoke escape or chimney, raised fire place and is well kept/clean
Does the Household have a sanitary Kitchen?
A Sanitary dwelling house is one which has: 1. Adequate light and Ventilation, 2. Free of dampness, 3. A raised Floor, 4. A floor that is well maintained and dust free, 5. Smooth floor and walls.
Is the Household living in a sanitary dwelling house?
A Household being ODF means no visible feaces around the household, presence of a functional handwashing facility and a fly proof latrine
Is the Household Open Defeacation Free (ODF)?
What kind of public toilet is present or used in this household?
Is the latrine fly proof (having a tight fitting squathole cover)?
What kind of main sanitary facility is present or used in this household?
Is the toilet/sanitary facility filled up (with in 1 meter to the floor)?
Is the household sharing a sanitary facility with a neighbour or using a public toilet?
No, it is connected to a Bio digester
No, it is connected to a Septic tank
Yes it is connected to a sewer
Is the toilet/sanitary facility connected to Public sewer?
Note to VHT – Verify if the household is sharing a sanitary facility with a neighbour or using a public toilet
Age must be between 12 and 120 for the household head
Method to select date of birth
Enter a valid name consisting of only letters starting with a capital letter
Method to select date of birth
Difficulty seeing even when wearing glasses or contact lenses
Difficulty in hearing even when using a hearing aid
Difficulty in Communicating (When Using his or her official language)
Difficulty in self-care (Difficulty in washing all over or dressing)
Difficulty in walking or climbing steps
VHT Visit Date can't be more than 7 days ago. Also can't be a future date
Has client tested for HIV in the last 3 months?
Does the client have Sickle Cell?
NIN should be 14 letters and digits
Encourage and refer the client to the health facility for HIV testing
Advise client to check their status and start medication if positive or advise on prevention of HIV practices if negative
Encourage the client to attend ART clinic to begin treatment
Be sensitive when asking this question
Encourage the client to reduce their risk of getting HIV and retest after 3 months
Encourage the client to continue taking their medication as has been prescribed
Explain the importance of the client taking their medication as has been prescribed
Please enroll them into care coordination using the Family Planning registration form
Please register the new household head
Note: Refer client that is not on TB treatment to the health facility to seek help in order to reduce the risk of spreading TB on to other household members
The VHT should assist or advice the client on how to get an insecticide treated net (LLIN)
The VHT should demonstrate how to hang an insecticide treated net (LLIN)
Mobile number should take this format 07XXXXXXXX / 039XXXXXXX
Mobile number should take this format 07XXXXXXXX / 039XXXXXXX
Has the client received HPV Vaccine?
Has the client received TT vaccine?
Is the client sleeping under an insecticide treated net (LLIN)?
Is the client taking their medication as prescribed?
Is the client using any family planning method?
Don't know how to hang/use insecticide treated net (LLIN)
There are not enough insecticide treated net (LLIN) for the number of people in household
Why is the Client not sleeping under an insecticide treated net (LLIN)?

Amazzi amayonjo kitegeeza amazzi agaggyiddwa mu nnayikondo, ag'omudumu n'ag'ensulo ezitangirwa obulungi obutagendamu bukyafu
Amaka galina obusobozi bw'okufuna amazzi amayonjo?
Ttooyi yammwe oba ekinnya omukuŋŋaanira kazambi kyali kiyooleddwamu kko?
Yayoolwamu bakozi nga bakozesa maanyi gaabwe na mikono.
Wansi ku sseminti wa ttooyi/ kaabuyonjo waazimbibwa mu ngeri ki? (Sseminti baamuzimbisa ki)?
Nedda, byombi amazzi ne ssabbuuni tebiriiwo
Mu kifo ewanaabirwa engalo waliwo amazzi agasumululwa okunaaba mu ngalo wamu ne ssabbuuni w'ekitole (oba ow'amazzi) mu kiseera w'okyaliddeyo?
Waliwo ekifo ewanaabirwa engalo okulinaana ttooyi/ kaabuyonjo?
Ennimiro y'emmanju y'eyo ebeeramu ebibala n'enva endiirwa era ng'eri kumpi n'ewaka
Ekinnya omugenda amazzi kibeera kinnya nga kijjuziddwa agayinja aganene, nga kibikkiddwako n'ekiveera era nga kuteereddwako n'ettaka waggulu
Amaka galina ekiyigo omunaabirwa wamu n'ekinnya omugenda amazzi g'ekiyigo?

Amazzi g'okunywa amalungi kitegeeza amazzi agabeera gafumbiddwa oba agateereddwamu eddagala eritta obuwuka, amazzi agaggyiddwamu obuwuka nga bakozesa amaanyi g'enjuba wamu n'amazzi agasengejjebwa mu ngeri ya kannabutonde okusobola okugaggyamu obuwuka
Ekiyungu ekiyonjo ky'ekyo ekiganya omukka okufuluma oba nga kirina akafo akafulumya omukka, ekifo ewafumbirwa nga kiri wagguluko era nga kikuumibwa nga kiyonjo

Ennyumba ennyonjo y'eyo erina bino wammanga: 1. Ekitangaala ekimala era ng'eyingiza bulungi empewo, 2. Nga teriimu bunnyogovu, 3. Sseminti nga musitufu, 4. Sseminti /wansi nga walabirirwa bulungi era nga tewali nfuufu, 5. Sseminti n'ebisenge nga si bibomofubomofu.

Amaka okubeera nga Tebeeyamba Buli Wamu kitegeeza kubeera nga tolina wantu wonna w'olaba bbi okwetooloola ewaka, okubeerawo kw'ekifo we banaabira engalo era nga kikozesebwa wamu ne ttooyi enzimbe obulungi
Mu maka ago Tebeeyamba Buli Wamu ?
Kika ki ekya kaabuyonjo y'olukale ekiriwo oba ekikozesebwa mu maka gano?
Kaabuyonjo erina ekiziyiza ensweera okufulumamu (erina ekisaanikira ku kituli ekigyako obulungi)?
Kika kya kaabuyonjo ki ekiriwo oba ekikozesebwa mu maka?
Ttooyi/ Kaabuyonjo yajjula (ebulako mmita emu okutuukira ddala kungulu)?
Amaka gagabana kaabuyonjo ne mulirwana oba bakozesa kaabuyonjo ya lukale?
Nedda, yayungibwa ku muyungo ogukola ggaasi okuva mu kazambi
Nedda, yayungibwa ku kinnya ewakuŋŋaanira kazambi.
Yee, yayungibwa ku mudumu ogutwala kazambi.
Kaabuyonjo eno yagattibwa ku mudumu ogw'olukale ogutwala kazambi?
VHT ky'alina okwetegereza: Kakasa oba amaka gagabana kaabuyonjo ne mulirwana oba gakozesa kaabuyonjo ya lukale
Emyaka gy'akulira amaka giteekeddwa kebeera wakati wa 12 ne 120
alina enkola ya ttekinologiya eyambako abalina obulemu yonna gy'akozesa?
Enkola y'okulondako ennaku z'omwezi lwe wazaalibwa
Yingizaamu erinnya ettuufu nga likolebwa nnukuta zokka ate nga litandisa nnukuta nnene
Enkola y'okulondako ennaku z'omwezi lwe wazaalibwa
Obuzibe bw'amaaso (Akaluubirizibwa mu kulaba ne bw'obeera oyambadde gaalubindi oba obulabirwamu obweyambisibwa okulaba).
Obutawulira (Okukaluubirizibwa mu kuwulira ne bw'obeera okozesa obuuma obukuyambako okuwulira)
Okukaluubirizibwa mu kwogerezeganya n'abalala (ng'okozesa olulimi lwo oluzaaliranwa).
Akaluubirizibwa okujjukira (okujjukira ebintu ebyaliwo) oba ebirowoozo okutebenkera ku kintu.
Obuzibu mu kwefaako (Obuzibu mu kunaaba buli wamu oba mu kwambala)
Obulema (Okukaluubirizibwa mu kutambula oba okuwalampa amadaala)
Ennaku z'omwezi zirina kubeera mabega wa leero
Ennaku z'omwezi VHT lwe yakyala tezirina kubeera nga zisukka mu nnaku omusanvu eziyise. Era tezisobola kubeera za mu biseera bya mu maaso
Omuntu akolebwako ali ku ddagala lya mukenenya?
Akolebwako yali akebeddwako akawuka ka mukenenya mu myezi esatu egiyise?
NIN erina kubeera na nnukuta wamu n'ennamba kkumi na nnya
Omuntu mukubirize era omusindike mu ddwaliro yeekebeze akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.

Mukubirize yeekebeze amanye bwayimiridde era bw'abeera mulwadde atandike okufuna obujjanjabi. Oba omuntu oyo omuwe amagezi ku ngeri y'okwekuumamu singa asangibwa nga talina bulwadde buleeta mukenenya.
Mukubirize okugenda mu ddwaliro atandike okufuna obujjanjabi bwa mukenenya.
Mukubirize akendeeze okwenyigira mu bikolwa ebimuteeka mu katyabaga k'okwatibwa akawuka ka mukenenya era addemu yeekebeze oluvannyuma lw'emyezi esatu.
Mukubirize okugenda mu maaso n'okufuna obujjanjabi nga bwe bwamulagiddwa.
Nyonnyola ebirungi by'okufuna obujjanjabi nga bwe bumulagiddwa.
Osabibwa obawandiise ng'okozesa ffoomu ewandiisizibwako enkola z'ekizaalaggumba.
Osabibwa owandiise akulira amaka aliwo kati
Weetegereze: Bwaba tali ku ddagala ly'akafuba musindike mu ddwaliro atandike okufuna eddagala ly'akafuba kiyambe obutasaasaanya bulwadde bw'akafuba eri bantu b'omu maka.
VHT amuyambeko oba amuwe amagezi ku kikwatagana n'okusula mu katimba k'ensiri akalimu eddagala.
VHT ateekeddwa okumulaga engeri gye bawanikayo akatimba k'ensiri akalimu eddagala
Ennamba y'essimu erina kubeera na nnamba/ bifo kkumi
Ennamba y'essimu erina kubeera na nnamba/ bifo kkumi
RIN erina kubeera na nnamba kkumi na ssatu
Asula mu katimba k'ensiri akalimu eddagala?
Tamanyi bwe bawanikayo/ bakozesa katimba ka nsiri kalimu ddagala
Talina katimba ka nsiri kalimu ddgala
Lwaki omuntu tasula mu katimba ka nsiri kalimu ddagala?

Mukubirize yeekebeze amanye bwayimiridde era bw'abeera mulwadde atandike okufuna obujjanjabi. Oba omuntu oyo omuwe amagezi ku ngeri y'okwekuumamu singa asangibwa nga talina bulwadde buleeta mukenenya.

bind.relevant: ( /data/clinic/group_wash/hh_sanitary_facility ='pit_latrine' or /data/clinic/group_wash/hh_sanitary_facility ='ventilated_improved_pit_latrine' or /data/clinic/group_wash/hh_sanitary_facility ='unimproved_pit_latrine') or (( /data/clinic/group_wash/hh_sanitary_facility ='flush' or ( /data/clinic/group_wash/hh_sanitary_facility ='public_toilet' and /data/clinic/group_wash/hh_kind_of_public_toilet ='flush')) and ( /data/clinic/group_wash/hh_toilet_conected_to_sewer ='no_connected_to_septic_tank' or /data/clinic/group_wash/hh_toilet_conected_to_sewer ='no_connected_to_biodigester'))

itemset.nodeset: instance('select_relationship')/root/item[((prefecture!=3 and /data/repeat/child/c_sex ='male') or (prefecture!=4 and /data/repeat/child/c_sex ='female')) and ((prefecture!=2 and /data/repeat/child/current_age <12) or (prefecture>0 and /data/repeat/child/current_age >=12)) and ((prefecture!=2 and /data/repeat/child/c_sex = /data/contact/g_sex ) or (prefecture>0 and /data/repeat/child/c_sex != /data/contact/g_sex ))]
